name: The Media Trader
description: The Media Trader is a Digital Trading Desk that use financial trading knowledge and a smart mining of data to purchase programmatically ads.

team.title: Chief Technology Officer
team.name: Omar MAES
team.bioHtml: Founder @The Media Trader • Worked at @BNP Paribas, @Societe Generale • Studied at @Ecole Polytechnique, @Universite Paris Dauphine

perks.title: Private medical health insurance by AXXA

jobs.title: Junior Software Developer
jobs.description:
Fancy getting involved with one of Media’s most exciting start-ups?

We’re looking for an awesome Software Developer who’s not afraid to get stuck in.

We’re passionate about what we do.We want someone who can share and spread that passion!

We are looking for top talent to help us make The Media Trader an even better company with even better Products.

We can’t promise a quiet life - in fact, we promise quite the opposite. We are already in the middle of a global expansion with offices in Paris, London, New York, Dublin and Dubai and some opening in Milan and Luxembourg.

It’ll always be exciting, and you shouldn’t be afraid of a challenge. Things move fast at The Media Trader; we need someone who can keep up and who enjoys working in an environment a million miles away from the grey suits and boredom of Banking and Asset Management firms.

Can you picture yourself working for an innovative and disruptive start-up, backed by some of the most well respected entrepreneurs in the world?

If the answer’s yes, then read on:
Responsibilities:

* Partner closely with business stakeholders to understand project’s requirements in depth.
* Work closely with CTO and his development team to implement versatile solutions to tricky Media market problems.
* Develop reliable internally or externally available web service while monitoring and enhancing performance of existing tools and services.
* Launch, iterate and make a difference.
* Provide full stack coding expertise, and be ready to make our products better for our users.
* Manage your own time, and work well both independently and as part of an Agile team. What we’re looking for:
* Enthusiasm and keen desire to succeed in handling complex project
* 1-2 of experience in the design, development, testing and delievery of complex IT solutions (Cloud based microservices in particular)
* Deep understanding about leveraging RESTful API, from reading and producing design specification accordingly to our partner integration requirements, troubleshooting, testing and supporting QA testing;
* Keen to deliver and maintain technical and process documentation
* Strong knowledge of various integration approaches such as microservices, messaging, queuing, API patterns, etc
* Great team-working skills as well as self-motivation
* Initiative to research and uncover new methods and approaches

Our stack:
NodeJS, Angular, TypeScript, Javascript, C#, . NET, Python 3, Neo4j, AWS, Gitlab, Docker, PostgreSQL

Who you are:

You’re excited by facing new challenges every day
You have an understanding of how manage a project and have used version control in your life
You have a Master’s degree in Computer related subject area or related business field and you are willing to work in an Agile environment
Organised, numeric and systematic
A cool head under the pressure of meeting deadlines.
You’re good fun to sit next to in an office;Compensation:
This is a junior-mid role but the compensation will be offered accordingly to the profile of the candidate.

Join our team:

We’re a dedicated bunch of people from a large range of backgrounds. Working here can be hard, but we think it’s always fun and rewarding. Our partners are providing full and useful learning validated by recognised international certifications, we will be happy to enrol you in as a good starting point for a successful career. We’re constantly dreaming up new and better ways to do what we do. We’re making a name for ourselves as a disruptive presence in the market. We’re succeeding in our vision and we’re looking for great people to join in and drive that success.

Benefits:

* Flexible working hours
* Work from home opportunities
* Private medical/dental insurance
* Casual dress

jobs.title: Lead Software Developer
jobs.description:
Can you picture yourself working for an innovative and disruptive start-up, backed by some of the most well respected entrepreneurs in the world?

If Yes, read on:

Tech Stack:
NodeJS, Angular, TypeScript, Javascript, C#, . NET, Python 3, Neo4j, AWS, Gitlab, Docker, PostgreSQL

Responsibilities:

•	Partner closely with business stakeholders to understand the project’s requirements in depth.
•	Work closely with CTO and his development team to implement versatile solutions to tricky Media market problems.
•	Develop reliable internally or externally available web service while monitoring and enhancing the performance of existing tools and services.
•	Launch, iterate and make a difference. Provide full stack coding expertise, and be ready to make our products better for our users.
•	Manage your own time, and work well both independently and as part of an Agile team.

The Team:

We’re a dedicated bunch of people from a large range of backgrounds. Working here can be hard, but we think it’s always fun and rewarding. Our partners are providing full and useful learning validated by recognised international certifications, we will be happy to enrol you in as a good starting point for a successful career. We’re constantly dreaming up new and better ways to do what we do. We’re making a name for ourselves as a disruptive presence in the market. We’re succeeding in our vision and we’re looking for great people to join in and drive that success.

Benefits:

Flexible working hours
Work from home opportunities
Private medical/dental insurance
Casual dress
